name: only-child
title: :only-child Selector
desc: Selects all elements that are the only child of their parent.

examples.desc: Change the text and add a border for each button that is the only child of its parent.
examples.css: div { width:100px; height:80px; margin:5px; float:left; background:#b9e }

entries.longdesc: If the parent has other child elements, nothing is matched.
